author: Simon Difford
description: Like many supposed hangover cures, this works on the kill or cure basis. It tastes slightly better than it looks.
name: Prairie Oyster pick-me-up (Alcohol-free*)

recipeInstructions.text: Taking care not to break the egg yolk, PLACE it in the centre of the hollow in the glass
SHAKE the rest of the ingredients with ice and strain over egg
Instruct drinker to down in one
